data.message: Hi looking forward to hearing this album 😁 - dont think many of you guys will prob see this comment now but just wanted to warn you lovely guys that ive had messages off a couple of people pretending to be Marshall mathers and then eventually asking for my bank details to pay for a delivery fee for a briefcase that he doesnt want his management to find out about. They went into alot of effort obvs i didnt fall for it but dont want anyone else to ✌ xxx
